it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a single card inside the game, every card must be unique and it's represented by its value and its suit. It's allowed to obtain the String version of the card and the comparison between cards.
